properties.areaDesc: Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains; Northeast Bighorn Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 9 at 2:34AM MST until January 10 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches.

* WHERE...In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. In Montana,
Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains.

* WHEN...From noon today to 9 AM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel on Highway 14 and roads in the Story area will
be impacted by snow cover and limited visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 AM MST FRIDAY
